| 17 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( +g ` ( oppG ` G ) ) = ( +g ` ( oppG ` G ) ) |
| 18 | 15, 16, 17 | #P_ogrpaddlt | |- ( ( ( oppG ` G ) e. oGrp /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) /\ X ( lt ` ( oppG ` G ) ) Y ) -> ( X ( +g ` ( oppG ` G ) ) Z ) ( lt ` ( oppG ` G ) ) ( Y ( +g ` ( oppG ` G ) ) Z ) ) |
